scripts.test:unit: yarn run compile && yarn run unit
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run unit
scripts.minfiy-build-js: uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/application.js -o src/assets/javascript/application.js -c -m && uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/cookies.js -o src/assets/javascript/cookies.js -c -m && uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/showPassword.js -o src/assets/javascript/showPassword.js -c -m
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.njk dist/ src/locales/**/** dist/ src/config/*.txt dist/ && copyfiles -u 3 src/assets/javascript/*.js dist/public/scripts -e **/all.js
